title: Clovis the Plasma Magus
body:
As a young man clovis found his magical powers far exceeded those of his fellow Pyromancers he could control one of the hottest substances known to Valoran, Plasma. Only one other person managed to control that kind of power he died as part of the Noxian Army trying to destroy Demacia. He now has the power that could be used to completely erase a small city without breaking a sweat.
Now he has this power an elder from the village intends to put him on the right path to avoid the destruction that once played out on valoran in the past. With this power he decided to do bad and good things to ensure balance between order and chaos is maintained. His powers are currently weaker but as he is trained by the elder his power grows so does the balance of chaos and order

Clovis :  The Plasma Magus
Hybrid
Primary mage
Secondary Marksman
	
Passive: Plasmatic Destruction
Each basic attack applies a stack of plasma, at 5 stacks it stuns the opponent for 1 second and that target cannot be stunned again for 15 seconds, each stack lasts 3 seconds and is refreshed upon applying another stack

Q: Plasma beam 10/9/8/7/5 Second Cooldown
Clovis throws out a beam of plasma dealing 40/45/50/55/60 damage (+0.8 x total ability power) + (10% of the targets remaining health)

W: Healing Plasma 15/13/11/9/8 Second Cooldown
Passive: Clovis Gains 1 Attack Damage per unit killed around him, amount gained is doubled for large monsters and champions
When cast on allies and himself heals for 5% of targets missing health
When cast on enemies deals 30/40/50/100/105 Damage (+0.75 x Total Attack Damage)

E: Burning Plasma 20/16/12/8/6 Second Cooldown
Throws a ball of plasma at a target applying 10 True damage (+10 true damage per stack of plasmatic destruction) on hit, as well slowing the target by 15/20/25/30/35% as well as dealing 50/55/60/65/70 (+0.6 x Total Attack Damage) (+0.75 Total Ability Power)

R: Plasma Bombardment 100/90/80 Second Cooldown
Clovis Surrounds himself, an ally or an enemy in 5 balls of plasma lasting 3/5/7 Seconds dealing 150 True damage to the first champion hit and stunning all targets hit for 0.5/0.75/1 Second(s) and dealing 100/150/175 Damage (+0.9 x total Attack damage) (+1 x Total ability power)
